Thank you to the Chamber for this recognition & for joining discussions with business leaders across them Lowcountry. We discussed affordable housing, labor shortages, and supply chain issues. #LowcountryFirst

Yesterday I received an award from the US Chamber of Commerce called "The Advocate for American Business Award."

GI Bill benefits should be more easily accessible, not less, to those who served.
